name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - feature/beta-distribution

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v2
      with:
        node-version: '14'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install

    - name: Build the app
      run: npm run build

    - name: Deploy to Firebase
      uses: w9f/firebase-action@v1.3.0
      with:
        args: deploy --only hosting:beta
      env:
        FIREBASE_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.FIREBASE_TOKEN }}
